main event: Two military personnel observed a bright bluish-white light over Tinker A.F.B. that exhibited unusual maneuvering capabilities.
interesting points: The object was compared to the brightness of the planet Venus but appeared twice as large., The object changed course after each hovering action., It slowed down to practically a stop and moved in a fish-tailing motion., The object was observed hovering for approximately two minutes., Both witnesses were familiar with conventional aircraft, and were certain it was not.
witnesses: S/Sgt Dale E. McCombs and PFC Charles E. Brown
